alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms with heavy downpours will impact portions of northern Windham, Tolland, northeastern Hartford, south central Worcester and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms with heavy downpours near Ellington, or 8 miles northeast of Vernon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Enfield, Vernon, Mansfield, South Windsor, Webster, Southbridge, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Oxford, Charlton, Coventry, Stafford, Spencer, Somers, Dudley, East Windsor, Leicester and Putnam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
